mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( memberId, memberPassword, memberName, address, memberpoint, userRole ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{address}, #{point}, #{userRole} )
mapper.select: SELECT memberNo, memberId, memberPassword, memberName, address, memberpoint, userRole FROM MEMBER
SELECT memberNo, memberId, memberPassword, memberName, address, memberpoint, userRole FROM MEMBER WHERE memberNo = #{memberNo}
SELECT memberNo, memberId, memberPassword, memberName, address, memberpoint, userRole FROM MEMBER WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
